item.title: Destructive Sensuality
item.author: av0id.biz@gmail.com (Nikola Stoyanov)
item.description: Destructive Sensuality is a video collage investigating the specifics of commercial video codec degradation. Based on key moments in Bulgariaâ€™s visual subconscious made up of vital videos, it uses various methods of controlled im- age destruction and degradation based on structural compression in videos. Destructive Sensuality is a pop-up exhibition by Sofia Dimova and Nikola Stoyanov, where the two artists romanticize the destructive dynamics of sensual experiences that imperceptibly become part of our everyday lives.
